Class DailyTransactions

  • java.lang.Object
    • DailyTransactions

  • public class DailyTransactions
extends java.lang.Object
    DailyTransactions Provides methods and attributes for interacting with the daily transactions file in memory, and outputting to disk.
    Author:
    Jonathan Gillett, Daniel Smullen, Rayan Alfaheid

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String mergedDTF 
      private java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<java.lang.String> mergedTransactions 
      private java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> transactions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactions()
      Provides a handle to the ArrayList of transactions that comprise the daily transaction file.
      private void load()
      Load the contents of the merged collection of all daily transaction files into a single array containing each transaction as a line.
      private void parse()
      Reads in the contents of merged daily transaction files, and converts them into Transaction entries.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DailyTransactions

        public DailyTransactions(java.lang.String mergedDTF)
                  throws FatalError,
                         java.io.IOException
        Constructor for the class. Takes the path to the available tickets file, and opens it.
        Parameters:
        mergedDTF - String containing the path to the file containing the merged daily transaction files.
        Throws:
        FatalError - Fatal errors occur under the following circumstances:
        The Daily Transaction file is missing, or not found at the path specified.
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getTransactions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactions()
        Provides a handle to the ArrayList of transactions that comprise the daily transaction file.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of Transaction objects, representing all entries in the daily transaction file.

      • load

        private void load()
           throws FatalError,
                  java.io.IOException
        Load the contents of the merged collection of all daily transaction files into a single array containing each transaction as a line.
        Throws:
        FatalError - Fatal errors occur under the following circumstances:
        The Daily Transaction file is missing, or not found at the path specified.
        The Daily Transaction file is corrupt.
        java.io.IOException

      • parse

        private void parse()
            throws FatalError
        Reads in the contents of merged daily transaction files, and converts them into Transaction entries. Entries which do not conform to the standards for entries are considered corrupted and unreadable.
        Throws:
        FatalError - Fatal errors occur under the following circumstances:
        The Daily Transaction file is corrupt.
